titleStmt.title: Instructions unto [blank] appointed by commission from his Highness the Lord Protector of the Commonwealth of England, Scotland, and Ireland, by and with the advice of his Council, to be Commissioners for ordering and mannaging [sic] the militia of the [blank].

notesStmt.note: A form describing the responsibilities of commissioners of the militia.
Blanks in title and text filled in ms.
Dated at end, in ms.: 14 March 1654.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
